scripts.m:deprecations: docker-compose exec -T server python -W always manage.py
scripts.pip:install:devtools: docker-compose --file docker-compose-devtools.yml run -T --rm devtools sh -c "pip uninstall --requirement docker/devtools/requirements.lock --yes && pip install --requirement docker/devtools/requirements.txt && pip freeze > docker/devtools/requirements.lock"
scripts.pip:install:server: docker-compose run -T --rm server sh -c "pip uninstall --requirement docker/server/requirements.lock --yes && pip install --requirement docker/server/requirements.txt && pip freeze > docker/server/requirements.lock"
scripts.pip:install:worker: docker-compose --file docker-compose-worker.yml run -T --rm worker sh -c "pip uninstall --requirement docker/worker/requirements.lock --yes && pip install --requirement docker/worker/requirements.txt && pip freeze > docker/worker/requirements.lock"
